Please delete options that are not relevant.

- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)

## Checklist

Before submitting your PR, please review and check the following:

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the relevant documentation (README, plugin docs, etc.)
- [ ] I have added/updated examples where appropriate
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)

### Testing
- [ ] I have tested the plugin locally using `claude --plugin-dir`
- [ ] I have tested all affected commands
- [ ] I have verified that existing functionality still works
- [ ] I have run `/check-commands` or `/check-agents` validation (if applicable)

### Git Practices
- [ ] My commits follow the Conventional Commits format
- [ ] My branch is up to date with the target branch
- [ ] I have resolved all merge conflicts
- [ ] My commit messages are clear and descriptive
